su.source: Yaret bs elshams tetkrm 3lya w te2blny :) bs ana lel asaf 3ndy meeting bkra f 3araby elsa3a 4 w nos :( lw ht3ody flsho3'l lb3d kda yb2a agelk

su.source: Ya lahwy! Fe eh! Enty ely mawlaty w 7bebty w om 3yaly

su.source: 22dr ashofk bokra 3shan ana t3bana shewaya enharda??? yaret ttkrmi 3alya blmwaf2a :))
su.auto_transliteration: اقدر اشوفك بكرة عشأن انا تعبانة شوية النهارده؟؟؟ ياريت تتكرمي عليه بالموافقة :((

su.source: ma balash yfkreny ba2a blgomal ale et2alet 3la 3'ery de :((

su.source: a7'bar eh ya 7obi? ana enharda wa7'da ezm w ray7a lel dr isa :(

su.source: 3mlty eh 3nd eldoc ya 7bebty? Ana 3yza aklmk bs 7'yfa tkony nayma
